channel.title: Java string

item.title: Java string
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

String[][] yellTitle = {
                                {"Player","<col=-1>"},
                                {"Moderator","<col=5445>"},
                                {"Admin","<shad=4324>"},
                                {"Owner","<shad=0xFFFF33>"},
                                {"Donator","<col=4564>"}
                };
                if(playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) {
                c.getPA().messageToAll("[" + yellTitle[1] +"" + yellTitle[c.playerRights] + "]</col></shad> <col=0x00009C>" + c.playerName + ": " + playerCommand.substring(5));
                }
        }

When I yell it says “Ljava.langString.@randomnumbers”
I’ve had this problem before, but I don’t remember how to fix it >_<
Does anyone know?

Read full topic
